com.simsilica.es.sql

Class SqlEntityData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.es.base.DefaultEntityData
      • com.simsilica.es.sql.SqlEntityData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityData, ObservableEntityData

    public class SqlEntityData
extends DefaultEntityData
    EntityData implementation that uses SQL tables to store persistent information.
